name: Chickpea Avocado Salad
description: A protein-packed salad with chickpeas, creamy avocado, fresh veggies, and a zesty lemon dressing.
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Toss gently and serve chilled.

name: Banana Oat Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes made with oats and bananas. Perfect for a healthy breakfast.
instructions: Blend all ingredients. Cook on a non-stick skillet until golden. Serve with fruit.

name: Lentil Bolognese
description: A hearty Italian-style sauce made with lentils, tomatoes, and herbs. Serve over pasta.
instructions: Cook lentils. Sauté onion and garlic, add tomatoes and lentils, simmer with herbs.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Colorful bell peppers stuffed with quinoa, black beans, and veggies. Baked to perfection.
instructions: Mix filling, stuff peppers, bake at 375°F for 25 min.

name: Berry Chia Pudding
description: A creamy, naturally sweet pudding made with chia seeds and fresh berries.
instructions: Mix chia, milk, and syrup. Chill overnight. Top with berries.

name: Sweet Potato Buddha Bowl
description: A nourishing bowl with roasted sweet potatoes, greens, chickpeas, and tahini dressing.
instructions: Roast sweet potato. Arrange all ingredients in a bowl. Drizzle with tahini dressing.

name: Zucchini Noodle Stir Fry
description: A light and flavorful stir fry using spiralized zucchini noodles and fresh veggies.
instructions: Stir fry veggies, add noodles and sauce, cook until just tender.

name: Coconut Mango Smoothie
description: A tropical smoothie with coconut milk, mango, and banana. Refreshing and energizing!
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.

name: Roasted Cauliflower Tacos
description: Tacos filled with spiced roasted cauliflower, slaw, and creamy avocado sauce.
instructions: Roast cauliflower with seasoning. Fill tortillas with all toppings.

name: Peanut Butter Energy Bites
description: No-bake bites with oats, peanut butter, and seeds. Great for on-the-go energy!
instructions: Mix all, roll into balls, chill before serving.

name: Quinoa Veggie Soup
description: A comforting soup with quinoa, vegetables, and herbs. Perfect for any season.
instructions: Simmer all ingredients until veggies and quinoa are tender.

name: Chocolate Chia Mousse
description: A rich, creamy mousse made with chia seeds, cocoa, and almond milk.
instructions: Blend all, chill until thickened. Top with berries.

name: Carrot Lentil Curry
description: A fragrant curry with carrots, lentils, and coconut milk. Serve with rice or naan.
instructions: Cook lentils and carrots, add coconut milk and curry, simmer.

name: Apple Cinnamon Overnight Oats
description: Easy overnight oats with apple, cinnamon, and maple syrup. Perfect for busy mornings.
instructions: Mix all, refrigerate overnight. Enjoy cold or warm.

name: Spicy Hummus Wrap
description: A quick wrap with spicy hummus, veggies, and greens. Great for lunch on the go.
instructions: Spread hummus, add veggies and greens, roll up and slice.
